Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson knows a thing or two when it comes to selling a project or product with his name attached to it.
And over the weekend, the Hollywood leading man and XFL co-owner put his to… [+5188 chars]

articles.author: Josh Alston
articles.title: NRL legend Jarryd Hayne gets roasted by Parramatta Eels teammates for cropping pics - Daily Mail
articles.description: Former NRL star Jarryd Hayne has developed a new skill in retirement: the art of cropping Instagram photos to look his best. His teammates have not missed that fact and have roasted him for it.
articles.content:
NRL bad boy Jarryd Hayne has developed a new skill in retirement: the art of cropping Instagram photos to look his best, and it has not gone unnoticed by his ex-teammates.
Hayne is currently out on … [+3056 chars]
